short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes biases and slants from news articles using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing BS Filter, a Chrome extension designed to help you navigate the complex world of news by removing biased language from news articles. In an era plagued by polarized perspectives, this extension is a must-have tool for anyone seeking to gain a balanced and objective understanding of current events.

BS Filter uses AI to neutralize biased phrases and loaded language, allowing you to focus on the facts and develop your OWN stance on current issues. Ideal for students, educators, journalists, and anyone who values truth and objectivity, BS Filter helps users overcome the challenges posed by today's media landscape.

Experience news as it should be - clear, unbiased, and informative. Equip yourself with BS Filter and join the fight against misinformation today.

This extension is a proof of concept and is not meant to be used as a replacement for a news aggregator.
